content.1: Let's start with the basics. Enter your character's name and select their generation.
content.2: Choose a clan for your character. Each clan has its own unique traits and abilities.
content.3: Distribute points among your character's attributes. These will determine their physical, social, and mental capabilities.
content.4: Select the disciplines your character has access to. These are supernatural powers that can be used in various ways during gameplay.
content.5: Choose a predator type for your character. This will influence their feeding habits and how they interact with kine.

strength.description: Strength represents the character's ability to deadlift, how hard they hit, and how much force they can exert with their body.
levels: ● They can easily crush a beer can. (Deadlift 20kg)
● ● ● They might be able to break down a wooden door. (Deadlift 115kg)
● ● ● ● ● Break open a metal door or tear open a chain-link fence. (Deadlift 250kg)

dexterity.description: Dexterity represents how agile a character is, how graceful they can be, or how nimble their fingers are.
levels: ● They can run but struggle with balance and dodging.
● A solid sprint and sometimes can appear graceful.
● ● ● Impressive agility and their coordination is equal to a trained amateur.
● ● ● ● They move in a way few humans can and could excel at acrobatics.
● ● ● ● ● Almost superhuman movements that are liquid and hypnotic.
